cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils

Class FileAccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils.FileAccountManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountManager

    public class FileAccountManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccountManager
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils/FileAccountManager.java

    Class for managing user accounts for different cloud storage services. It uses files as a storage medium.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk
